alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 02 at 4:13AM AKDT until November 04 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River, including the highway summits along the Steese. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 7 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing and drifting snow expected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
